code: import React from'react';import{Modal}from'@pancakeswap/uikit';import{useTranslation}from'contexts/Localization';import useEditProfile,{Views}from'./reducer';import StartView from'./StartView';import PauseProfileView from'./PauseProfileView';import ChangeProfilePicView from'./ChangeProfilePicView';import ApproveCakeView from'./ApproveCakeView';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const viewTitle={[Views.START]:'Edit Profile',[Views.CHANGE]:'Change Profile Pic',[Views.REMOVE]:'Remove Profile Pic',[Views.APPROVE]:'Enable CAKE'};const EditProfileModal=_ref=>{let{onDismiss}=_ref;const{currentView,goToChange,goToRemove,goToApprove,goPrevious}=useEditProfile();const{t}=useTranslation();const translationKey=viewTitle[currentView];const isStartView=currentView===Views.START;const handleBack=isStartView?null:()=>goPrevious();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal,{title:t(translationKey),onBack:handleBack,onDismiss:onDismiss,hideCloseButton:!isStartView,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{maxWidth:'400px'},children:[currentView===Views.START&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StartView,{goToApprove:goToApprove,goToChange:goToChange,goToRemove:goToRemove,onDismiss:onDismiss}),currentView===Views.REMOVE&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PauseProfileView,{onDismiss:onDismiss}),currentView===Views.CHANGE&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChangeProfilePicView,{onDismiss:onDismiss}),currentView===Views.APPROVE&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ApproveCakeView,{goToChange:goToChange,onDismiss:onDismiss})]})});};export default EditProfileModal;
